t:
reflections.

Yesterday, she sat there, berating me for my appearance. I asked her to stop, but she didn't listen.


Today, I stand here, strangling
her to death. She begs me to
stop, but I won't listen.
c:
I'll fill her void; she'll fill my bed.



Participate in this #simile challenge and describe how the two of you — lovers, friends, flatmates or you and your pet — are like. #twoofus  #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba





#appearance #berated #hurt #murder #revenge
